channel.title: Astrofy | Personal Portfolio Website Template
channel.description: Astrofy is a free and open-source template for your Personal Portfolio Website built with Astro and TailwindCSS. Create in minutes a website with Blog, CV, Project Section, Store and RSS Feed.
